name: Griffon Aviation
about: Griffon Aviation, located in Limassol, Cyprus, is a leading flight training organization renowned for its high standards and comprehensive training programs. The school offers a 30 Day Private Pilot License (PPL) course, allowing students to complete their training while enjoying a holiday in Cyprus. With a focus on quality and safety, Griffon Aviation provides airplane flight training tailored to meet the needs of aspiring pilots. The school's experienced instructors and state-of-the-art facilities ensure that students receive the best possible education in aviation. Griffon Aviation is committed to maintaining very high standards, making it the go-to choice for those seeking professional flight training in a supportive and scenic environment. Join Griffon Aviation to embark on a successful aviation career.
